content: There's a new R5 preview release at http://hl7.org/fhir/2020Sep. This version is the stable base for the the Septermber connectathon. Most of the changes are in the regulated Medicine and EBM space

I've found out that there is an error in fhir-single.xsd. This xml schema contains a new complexType with name "Event Or Request Resource Types", which is not allowed (name with spaces).
Should I report that on jira.hl7.org?
